sentences.english: Only a small number of dead enders were still in his thrall.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數人死亡的誘惑仍然在他的崇信。

sentences.english: We're exploring the truth of science and art of school life.
sentences.chinese: 探索科學之真，崇信生命之善，享受藝術之美。

sentences.english: China boasts a good tradition of seeking friendship and living in amity with its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 中國自古以來就有親仁善鄰，崇信修睦的優良傳統。

sentences.english: There is evidence of the existence of some Hinayana Buddhism of the Sanskrit canon.
sentences.chinese: 有史料證明有崇信梵文佛典的小乖佛教存在。

sentences.english: And yet you believe in a monotheistic universe? No room for one than one god in your world.
sentences.chinese: 但你卻崇信一神論？你的世界裏容不下另一位上帝。
